      public void showChatMessage(String sender, String messageChatContent, ChatMessageType type)
      method that manage all new message, both send or received by the client
      Parameters:
      sender - client who send the message
      messageChatContent - text message that has been written
      type - allow the method to understand whether it is dealing with a new message written form the client o received by the client.
